channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023080562
item.description:
Report X-2023080562

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-27
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found pkg in nonhazardous tote. Pkg was corroded. I completed DPR, ISF, and now HESS. Area was cleaned up properly. DescribePack: Pkg was torn and ripped. Box was corroded due to content spilling in box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was properly handled following guidelines. Pkg was placed in pail and awaiting disposition response.

item.title: Report X-2023080494
item.description:
Report X-2023080494

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-27
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: pkg was found in nonhazardous tote in QA area. Damage report was completed, ISF completed, and now HESS completion. DescribePack: Pkg had a puncture hole on top. Upon opening, one gallon had loose cap and majority of contents spilled out and another gallon had small amount of missing content/liquid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: hazmat material was properly handled and cleaned up properly. Followed correct processes.

item.title: Report E-2023080139
item.description:
Report E-2023080139

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-06
  • City: RICHLAND
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the poly 55 gallon drum of sant 10 plus (un1903) releasing 4 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023080135
item.description:
Report E-2023080135

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: REDWOOD
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During unloading facility storage tank gauge broke allowing slight amount of material in tank to be released. Unloading stopped, repair made and unloading continued without incident. Consignee personnel cleaned up release and processed properly.
